### Making feature matrix
```{r eval = F}
library( dplyr )
library( tidyr )

feature_df <- tested_table %>%
  select( `Molecule ID`, Knockout, `t statistic` ) %>%
  spread( key = Knockout, value = `t statistic` )

```
